name: 3d-pong
description:
Free 3d-pong game with split-screen included so you can play locally against a friend. Works on all major browsers with gamepads, mouse, touch or keyboard. On computers, mobile, Xbox One webbrowser.

Windows store page: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/p/3d-pong/9n...

Gameplay video:

Play on https://3d-pong.com/
